name: Ready Steady Mental
description:
Ready Steady Mental is a new, exciting game for Google Cardboard.

All you need to do is scream and shake your head for 10 seconds. The more you go nuts, the higher the score. Also, bleeding edge graphics and never-before-seen gameplay. Oh, and 3D VR CARDBOARD SUPPORT!!!!!! How Mental are you? How about your friends?

Ready?

Steady?

* * * * *

A game by
@CptSub / Submachine Factory
@terramyx / SUPERHOT Team
